Este juego es muy entretenido, el problema de este titulo es que no hay tantas personas para jugar en servidores, y hay puros bots que te matan, y de vez en cuando hay personas jugando en una partida.
Este titulo literalmente es un buen simulador de un guerra y aun no esta tan olvidado como Half Life 2 Deathmatch, recomiendo conseguirlo en rebajas de steam. Si quieres un juego shoter diferente esto es para ti :)
Bacana, dá pra dar uns tirinhos naquele clima de guerra mundial, recomendo
Great game

While it is a balanced game, the original DoD is superior in every way but sound and graphics. If you don't mind HL era graphics, I recommend playing the original instead. DoD:S has fewer maps, fewer cflasses, fewer weapons. What it does have are some new options like iron sights, rifle grenades and select fire options, which are all pretty much useless. They tried to make the classes more different but I am afraid in the process they lost the feeling of the game.
But that does NOT mean, that DoD:S is a bad game. Quite the contrary. The fantastic gameplay is still there. It's just inferior to the original.

Лучшая игра современности

I don't know what makes it so special, maybe it's the magic of old games but, it feels really good. Gameplay is very different from other team deathmatch objective games. Every class is restricted to it's speciality, mg can only reload when set up, firing it without set up is almost useless, supressing the enemy is a thing thanks to short time to kill from most weapons, acuraccy is also very resticted and feels like CS, german k98 requires you to stand still for 1 second and rewards you with 100% even without aiming, maps have a lot of chocke that require team effort to utilize

Due to my multiplayer anxiety, I've never played with real player but with actually bots. (there is no bots in the game, you have to find 3rd party sources to get them, same with the original)
 The bots in this game is like the terminator on steroids and are very accurate in this game. Its quite annoying as i still couldn't find a way to lower the difficultly of the bots. Other than that, the game is fun but there is still not much to do in the game! 

Overall, I would recommend it if it was in a bundle of another game or was extremely cheap, like a dollar or 2.
If you have question, just ask! :) 
* i hope i received your response tho *

Very fun game once you get the hang of it. Haven't played much, and for the average joe this game should be pretty hard to get the hang of. Basically if you play this game your either really good or you really stink. I for one had some progress in the game, but most of the servers have all sorts of mods and other stuff, and most (if not all) of the gamers on the majority of servers are gods, just like any other online game. I recommend it, but I hope someday online games aren't only fun for gaming gods. There are some servers, not many, but some that don't have nerds where you can get comfortable with the game.

Dear, people of this Earth,

   Out of all war games, this one's the most basic and real. This is the game you play if you want to become any thing tactical or strategic in this life. Personally, I'm in love with the Thompson sub-machine-gun, because I love to be a hero. I love to run around, blessed by love, on a complete and total rampage; usually for America. (That's what's also neat, about this one! You get to learn all about the politics and idealogical tensions between an offensive government and a defensive one.) ((The game's only lacking a German Kapitan sword for the dude who carries the oldest version of the AK-47 ever made; the STG-44.)) One thing I would change about this game if I were Valve/Steam-Powered; is that I'd host a super powerful and amazing, 24/7 set of competitive servers for the real die hards; you'd also attract an easy 100,000: new players. For an old piece of programming? What can go wrong? You don't even need to modify the game very much at all, no need to make it all fancy; even. Don't make it pay to win, like some private servers; these days, are making it be: a bit. I never paid too win, I'm the best on the net; but I had to learn how to really murder a lot of people, in-game, so I could get too the top... The learning curve to become the best was nearly as hard as being Master League in Star Craft 2: Legacy of the Void, which's still the most difficult game to learn. I spend at least an hour per day, usually; playing Day of Defeat: Source, just to summon my most lightning-fast/insanely-violent energy; so I'm able to log onto that other strategy game, and maintain my place as one of the top professional gamers: on this planet. I give Day of Defeat: Source, a 10/10. Blizzard-Activision/Microsoft can really learn a great thing or two about the lovely parts of this game. (Especially how just any bullet in this game will end some one's life, if shot in the head...) ((I desire, heart-shots, too!))

          Sent with love, be healthy and strong, but most of all; be good!
Milo Therrien Newman!!

[h1] Зачем эту игру держать до последнего? [/h1]
Привет всем,обзор будет коротким так как игра мертва. Сервера фактически опустели, потому что на замену вышло достаточно игр про ВМВ. Достижения вы будете выполнять соло с ботами,но сами понимаете,сидеть на сервере с ботом в тишине это тупо не очень.
Покупать или нет?Точно нет,не тратьте свои деньги на пустую игру
